## R Markdown
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
> ggplot(data = gapminder) + 
+     geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = year, y = gdpPercap)) + 
+     facet_wrap(~ continent, nrow = 1) + theme_bw()+group_by(gapminder,country) %>% 
+     +     summarise(gdpPercap)
```
